text: Arianzus or Arianzos was a town of ancient Cappadocia, inhabited in Byzantine times. Arianzus is a titular see of the Ecumenical Patriarchate of Constantinople. Its site is located near Sivrihisar, Asiatic Turkey. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Cappadocia Category:Former populated places in Turkey Category:Populated places of the Byzantine Empire Category:History of Aksaray Province Category:Titular sees in Asia
title: Arianzus
